link_name: Template Cisco Small Business 2.4 and 2.5 SNMPv2
link_desc:
Introduction

This template is derived from Zabbix's "Template Net Cisco IOS SNMPv2"

It is known to work with Zabbix server 4.4 and Cisco SG350-28-K9 running images 2.4.0.94 and 2.5.0.92.

Created by full clone of Net Cisco IOS SNMPv2 then:

  • Unlinked Template Module Cisco CISCO-ENVMON-MIB SNMPv2
  • Unlinked Template Module Cisco CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB SNMPv2
  • Unlinked Template Module Cisco CISCO-PROCESS-MIB SNMPv2
  • Unlinked Template Module Cisco Inventory SNMPv2
  • Unlinked Template Module Generic SNMPv2
  • Linked Template Module ICMP Ping
  • Added Application System
  • Added Items:
    • SNMP agent availability
    • System contact
    • System image
    • System location
    • System name
    • System product ID
    • System serial number
    • Uptime
  • Added macro $NET.IF.IFNAME.NOT_MATCHES to exclude Logical, loopback and VLAN interfaces

Installation

Administration > General > Macros: SNMP_COMMUNITY

Download the file (link below).

Configuration > Templates > Import > browse to the downloaded file > Import

Configure a host > Templates > Link new templates > search for Template Net Cisco Small Business 2.4 SNMPv2 > Add

Bugs

  • No items for CPU
  • No items for fans
  • No items for memory
